ygData.subject: Re: best solo class?
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/12/99 2:58:20 PM Eastern Daylight Time, sykotic@ggi.net writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/12/99 2:58:20 PM Eastern Daylight Time, sykotic@...
writes:

<< The only class that CAN'T Solo all the way to 50 is a Wizard.
However, with that said, only Shamans, Druids (less so with Kiting
curtailed), Monks, Necromancers, and Shadow Knights can do it effectively.
>>

A monk trying to solo his way to 50 will be slow and painful... especially
at certain points along the path. In the 40's, few mobs give good exp that a
monk can solo effectively. Even with great equipment (including a haste
sash), anything beyond very low blues are a big risk. Further, lack of
ability to root makes soloing very problematic in dungeons -- especially if
the mob has SoW. I'm not saying it can't be done, but I wouldn't want to try
it. As a monk, sticking in groups seems far faster, in my experience. (Can't
say the same about my shaman...)
